text: The player of the year race is as wide open as the sport has recently seen. Want to go with experience, a freshman, a player from a non - power league? You won ’ t be wrong — now. There are no poor answers within reason. But we put forth our own 16 - player bracket two weeks ago and asked fans to decide. The winner? Tennessee ’ s Grant Williams, who beat Indiana ’ s Juwan Morgan in the final vote. In his sophomore campaign last season, Williams averaged 15. 2 points, 6 rebounds, and 1. 3 blocks, earning him SEC Player of the Year honors on a Tennessee team that went 26 - 9 overall and finished in first place in the conference with a 13 - 5 record.
